B2 [ C ] a company, person, etc. that provides things that people want or need, especially over a long period of time: supplier of They used to be a leading supplier of military equipment. He said that he had got the drugs from his usual supplier (= person who sells drugs illegally). Synonyms
purveyor formal
retailer
seller
vendor formal or specializedCompare
acquirer mainly US specialized
buyer
purchaser formal suppliers [ plural ]
a company that sells something: the suppliers I'll contact the suppliers and see if I can get the paint you want by Friday.
